attributes.action: Ban sale & consumption of alcohol in Houses of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: A petition to extend the laws and regulations applicable to the sale and consumption of alcohol in workplaces to include the premises of the Houses of Parliament. It is assumed that the grounds for this are self-evident to all but the ethically sub-normal and that therefore a  unanimous vote to have the relevant laws passed at the earliest opportunity can be expected as a matter of course whether this petition is debated or not.
